text: +1[mu] Your maximum hand size is increased by 1 for each tag you have. The first time a successful run on R&D or HQ ends each turn, draw 1 card for each card you accessed during that run. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Obelus

flavor: "In extremity, your conscience may make you terrible." -Omar Keung, the Flashpoint
text: Whenever you encounter a code gate, you may install Black Orchestra from your heap (paying its install cost). 3[credit]: +2 strength. Break up to 2 code gate subroutines, if able.
title: Black Orchestra

text: [click]: Make a run on Archives. If successful, instead treat it as a successful run on another central server. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Omar Keung: Conspiracy Theorist

flavor: Khan's avatar lifted her arm and the bird launched itself into the air.
text: 1[credit]: Break code gate subroutine. 3[credit]: +3 strength. 2[credit], return Peregrine to your grip: Derez a code gate. Use this ability only after using Peregrine to break all the subroutines on that code gate during a single encounter.
title: Peregrine

flavor: My brain is the key that sets my mind free.
text: 1[credit]: Break code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
title: Houdini

flavor: "Live, unfiltered, and uncensored: this is Net Mercur, signing off for the night. Stay safe, New Angeles."
text: The first time you spend at least 1[credit] from a stealth card each run, place 1[credit] on Net Mercur or draw 1 card. Use credits on Net Mercur for anything.
title: Net Mercur

flavor: "All bioroids are bound by the Three Directives, but in theory a bioroid could have any number of core directives. Even zero."
text:
Whenever you draw a card, reveal that card.
The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may look at the top card of R&D.
title: Find the Truth

flavor: "Last week, I crossed the street to avoid her. Today, she pulled me out of the rubble. Makes me rethink who the bad guys are."
text: 2[credit]: Draw 1 card. Use this ability only if you have suffered damage from a Corp card ability this turn.
title: First Responders

flavor: In battle, I take half the slain.
text:
The Runner can spend [click][click][click] to break up to 3 subroutines on Fairchild 3.0.
[subroutine] The Runner must pay 3[credit] or trash 1 of his or her installed cards.
[subroutine] The Runner must pay 3[credit] or trash 1 of his or her installed cards.
[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage or end the run.
title: Fairchild 3.0

flavor: "If you live off-site, please consult the building AI for temporary housing. We regret that your off-site family cannot join you here while we are in lockdown..."
text: Name a card. Remove all copies of that card in the heap from the game.
title: Ark Lockdown

flavor: "Wait a minute, I don't even have a cat."
text:
Play only if the Runner trashed an accessed Corp card during his or her last turn.
<trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, trash 2 installed non-program cards. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.
title: Hellion Beta Test

text: When you score Project Kusanagi, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token on it over 2. Hosted agenda counter: Choose 1 piece of ice to gain "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.
title: Project Kusanagi

text:
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
title: DNA Tracker

text: Whenever the Runner takes at least 1 net damage, trash the top card of the stack.
title: Jinteki: Potential Unleashed

flavor: "She used to work for me at my chop shop. Now she makes more money than I do." -MacPherson
text: [trash]: Shuffle all cards in HQ into R&D. The Runner may pay any number of credits to prevent 1 random card in HQ from being shuffled into R&D for every 2[credit] spent.
title: Alexa Belsky

flavor: Observing is fun, but it's just the appetizer.
text:
Play only if the Runner has fewer than 6[credit].
As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag.
Trash 1 installed card.
title: Observe and Destroy

text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to make the first run on his or her turn (even through a card ability), the Runner must spend 1[credit].
title: Service Outage

text:
Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags.
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Do 7 meat damage.
title: BOOM!

text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When the Runner's turn begins, trace 1 If successful, do 1 meat damage if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.
title: Door to Door

flavor: The event is now referred to as the Water Tower Massacre. No one was ever indicted, and no one knows who paid the prisec team responsible.
text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The install cost of each resource is increased by 2.
title: Scarcity of Resources
